title: Dogfooding: Use Taskulus to manage Taskulus
description: Migrate this planning work into Taskulus itself. Use it for remaining tasks. Surface any UX issues.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Dogfooding not started. Needs decision on whether to run tsk migrate to create a Taskulus project inside this repo or use a separate workspace. Awaiting direction.
